name: Flora Growth Corp.
description: Flora Growth Corp. is a global cannabis company focused on the cultivation, manufacturing, and distribution of cannabis products. Established in 2019 and headquartered in Toronto, Canada, Flora aims to leverage the vast potential of the cannabis market by providing high-quality, innovative products that meet the evolving needs of consumers. The company operates in Colombia, where it benefits from favorable regulations and a climate ideal for the cultivation of cannabis. Flora Growth combines traditional agriculture practices with modern technology to ensure sustainable and efficient production. Its product offerings encompass a wide range of cannabis-based products, including oils, edibles, and personal care items. Committed to quality and compliance, Flora adheres to stringent standards throughout its supply chain, from cultivation to distribution. The company also invests in research and development to explore new applications of cannabis and expand its product portfolio. Flora Growth's mission is to become a leading global player in the cannabis industry, promoting wellness and enhancing the quality of life for its consumers while fostering sustainable practices and community support.
